name: "Happy" Food
description: Loneliness is a revelry, solitary a magnificence, emptiness a quality, being single a noble sentiment, a. . . Why are there tears in my eyes. . . *woof* . . . This canned food tastes good, have one yourself. *woof*. . .

name: 1 O'clock
description: Curved Gear. The person touching it can perceive the curvature and flow of both time and space. The most painful memories of the heart will be awakened, resembling a baby born in swaddling clothes. Carla Donald is at the door of the Clock Tower's first floor collecting this item.

name: 10 O'clock
description: Cold Clockwork. The cooled air from this device can even freeze time. People nearby can be frozen in an instant. Freezing time lasts for ten hours. Carla Donald is at the door of the Clock Tower's first floor collecting this item.

name: 10000 Zeny Bag
description: A portable Zeny bag designed by Kafra Company. Use it to receive 10000 Zeny.

name: 100000 Zeny Bag
description: A portable Zeny bag designed by Kafra Company. Use it to receive 100000 Zeny.

name: 11 O'clock
description: Memory Mirror. Whenever the 11 O'clock bell rings, whoever stands in front of the mirror can see the most ugly and evil desires of the heart. It is said that those who see this will be unable to extricate themselves. Carla Donald is at the door of the Clock Tower's first floor collecting this item.

name: 12 O'clock
description: Sanctioner's Tide. A balance wheel that at first glance has no special features. However, Every midnight when the bell rings, You can throw this balance wheel into the air to open a wormhole passage. The buzzing from the otherworldly creatures of the wormhole shakes the Clock Tower. Carla Donald is at the door of the Clock Tower's first floor collecting this item.

name: 2 O'clock
description: Painful Quartz Hand. Don't ever be caught by its grip, because the hand won't let go of anything it grabs. It seems like this big hand wants to twist the celestial body so that it retreats into time and space. Carla Donald is at the door of the Clock Tower's first floor collecting this item.

name: 20000 Zeny Bag
description: A portable Zeny bag designed by Kafra Company. Use it to receive 20000 Zeny.

name: 200000 Zeny Bag
description: A portable Zeny bag designed by Kafra Company. Use it to receive 200000 Zeny.

name: 2017 Premium Collection
description: Open to get the full collection of Premium of 2017

name: 2018 Premium Collection
description: Open to get the full collection of Premium of 2018

name: 2019 Bandana
description: Don't underestimate this piggy headwear! Put it on and everything will go smoothly throughout the year! Shh! Quiet! This is between you and me only!

name: 2019 Bandana Blueprint
description: Don't underestimate this piggy headwear! Put it on and everything will go smoothly throughout the year! Shh! Quiet! This is between you and me only!

name: 2019 Blessing
description: Onik~ Onik~ Good fortune to you! Onik~ Onik~ Bad fortune begone! Wish you the best in the new year! - from the world's cutest Pig!

name: 2019 May Premium
description: “Joy and sunshine illuminate the road, the Kafra smile accompanies you in all your travels!” "To thank the adventurers who have been supporting us for a long time, the famous Kafra Company specially launched a special small card in the form of a monthly magazine. Hold it and you will feel its magical power. It's practical and highly collectible.

name: 2019 Premium Collection
description: Open to get the full collection of Premium of 2019

name: 2019.03 Premium
description: "It is the lively time of March, the land of Rune Midgard is full of life!" To appreciate the adventurers who have been supporting us for a long time, the famous Kafra Company specially launched a special small card in the form of a monthly magazine. Hold it and you will feel its magical power. It's practical and highly collectible.
